Summary: Mix between a sphere and a disc ( no sharp edges-more rounded).
divs: Sighting Details I was looking out over the city of syracuse from the north (app. 1mile north of the city line in Mattydale. I just happened to look out my computer room window and i saw it flashing in the sky. The colors were that of the rainbow and they were swirling around the horizontal face of the object. No sound( that i could hear )and no movement ( in any direction )that i could make out. I looked for about 5 minutes and for the life of me i cannot explain why i didn't grab my phone and take a picture. I admit i was a little scared and by the time i collected my thoughts and came to terms with what i was looking at i opened my window so i would have an unblocked (by the window) line of sight on the object. i went outside and stared for maybe 5 to 10 minutes and then i just came inside and went to bed. I have been very puzzled with my behavior during the siting because i had always told myself i would take a picture if i ever saw anything like that. But i was honestly in shock in a way and didn't think once about taking a picture until the next morning. I didn't tell anyone for awhile and as the months went by a started to think more and more about it and to question myself. I have never seen anything that I could not account for with conventional wisdom but this challenged my worldview a little bit ( actually alotta bit ). I just thought that since i had no physical proof that noone else would care what i said i saw but i really hope that your organization can assist me in making sense of it. ...I do appreciate your efforts and thank you for your time Sin, Eric Flynn
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Syracuse
There were no other sightings in Syracuse on or around September 5th 2009
